opportunities.title: Teaching Trainee Program
opportunities.description: A comprehensive training program for passionate graduates aged 27 or below who are eager to make a difference in education. This program offers expert mentorship, hands-on teaching experience, and opportunities for career growth.
requirements: Degree in Education or related fields
Genuine love for teaching and shaping young minds
Minimum of Second Class Upper division

opportunities.title: Mathematics Teacher (Secondary)
opportunities.description: We are seeking a passionate and experienced Mathematics teacher to join our secondary school faculty. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in mathematics and the ability to inspire students to excel in the subject.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics or related field

opportunities.title: Science Laboratory Technician
opportunities.description: Responsible for managing school science laboratories, preparing practical experiments, and ensuring safety standards are maintained.
requirements: OND/HND in Laboratory Technology or related field
Minimum 2 years experience in educational setting
Ability to work with students and teachers

opportunities.title: School Counselor
opportunities.description: Provide counseling services to students, supporting their emotional, social, and academic development. Work with parents and teachers to create a supportive learning environment.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Psychology, Counseling, or related field
Minimum 3 years experience in educational counseling

opportunities.title: Sports Coach
opportunities.description: Lead and develop the school's sports programs, train students in various sports, and prepare teams for inter-school competitions.
requirements: Degree in Physical Education or Sports Science

applicationProcess: Submit CV and cover letter online
